content.text:
It worked! The [remaining issues for `secure-scuttlebutt`](https://github.com/ssbc/secure-scuttlebutt/issues) are active and relevant, and once we got past the email onslaught it seems to be pretty smooth sailing.

**Are there any objections to pushing this to our other repositories?** I could also open a PR into each repository, but given the number of repos we have I'm hesitant to do that. I've recently made two other mechanical edits, adding a simple [`.gitignore`](https://github.com/ssbc/ssb-ws/commit/81e10b598b23dbc79dc26912a25b24d5c9ded94e) and [`.npmrc`](https://github.com/ssbc/ssb-ws/commit/c7e6f993aaf3bad58b71b0e28706369103b567a3) to the relevant repositories, so it would be simple to push `.github/stale.yml` as well.

cc: [@mikey](@6ilZq3kN0F+dXFHAPjAwMm87JEb/VdB+LC9eIMW3sa0=.ed25519) [@dominic](@EMovhfIrFk4NihAKnRNhrfRaqIhBv1Wj8pTxJNgvCCY=.ed25519) [@dan](@NeB4q4Hy9IiMxs5L08oevEhivxW+/aDu/s/0SkNayi0=.ed25519) [@happy](@RJ09Kfs3neEZPrbpbWVDxkN92x9moe3aPusOMOc4S2I=.ed25519)
